Posts.EditableText: The 2 or 3 people who offered to help me with the game, please PM me, and anybody else who is willing to help me with this. Im coming up with a story line as you read this, and ive already set out 50 squares for the first town. The story is set in Medieval times (obviously), and you have your basic swords and armour which you collect throughout the world. The world is based on Severance: Blade of Darkness, as are the items. most systems are set using string variables, as i havent used Quest properly for quite a while. (havent used it properly since i first made Ebersmile, which you will probably all remember), but with help i can probably get things done quicker. The gameplay and style is based on Diablo, as you will go through the world solving puzzles, and completing quests given by the NPC's. I dont think there will be much combat involved as its not really a hack and slash game. Any help would be much appriciated during the development of the game
